import { Component } from '@angular/core';
import { Note } from './note';

@Component({
  selector: 'app-root',
  templateUrl: './app.component.html',
  styleUrls: ['./app.component.css']
})
export class AppComponent {
  notes: Note[] = [
    {label: "HttpServer",
     description: "Write a serving get/post requests HTTP server",
     id: "c1"},
